channel.description: Soul Centered Institute for Stress and Tension Management - Total Wellness

item.title: Rumors Are Flying That We Finally Found Gravitational Waves
item.description:
Rumors Are Flying That We Finally Found Gravitational Waves

Excited rumors began circulating on Twitter this morning that a major experiment designed to hunt for gravitational waves-ripples in the fabric of spacetime first predicted by Albert Einstein-has observed them directly for the very first time. If confirmed, this would be one of the most significant physics discoveries of the last century.

item.title: Is an Ominous New Era of Diagnosing Psychosis by Biotype on the Horizon? - Mad In America
item.description:
Is an Ominous New Era of Diagnosing Psychosis by Biotype on the Horizon? - Mad In America

When former NIMH chief Dr. Thomas Insel speaks, people listen. Dr. Insel famously criticized the DSM a couple of years ago for its lack of reliability. He notably broke ranks with the APA by saying there were no bio-markers, blood tests, genetic tests or imaging tests that could verify or establish a DSM diagnosis of schizophrenia, bipolar or schizoaffective disorder.

item.title: Medical hypnotherapy can work, but for what?
item.description:
Medical hypnotherapy can work, but for what?

There is plenty of hype about hypnotherapy as a cure for everything from depression to weight loss. But what is the evidence to support the anecdotes and for which conditions is it likely to be most effective?

item.title: How big pharma got people hooked on opioids - and made tons of money off it
item.description:
How big pharma got people hooked on opioids - and made tons of money off it

How did America get to a point where legal opioid painkillers, marketed as medicine, killed nearly 19,000 people in 2014? One alarming explanation is that the drug companies behind these opioids wanted more people to buy their product, so they led a misleading campaign to get doctors to prescribe their drugs.

item.title: Scientific ways to get happy
item.description:
Scientific ways to get happy

We look at some easy, actionable steps you can take to increase your happiness. Ask anyone what they want from life, and a common answer will be "to be happy". Now of course, we know there are many different factors that contribute to happiness, but there are ways you can help yourself feel happier.

item.title: Hypnotherapy For Smoking Cessation: The Step-By-Step Guide
item.description:
Hypnotherapy For Smoking Cessation: The Step-By-Step Guide

Last updated: 15 March 2016 Want to help someone quit smoking? Without relying on pure willpower, prescriptions or gimmicks? Then hypnotherapy is the perfect choice. Hypnotherapy is extremely effective when it comes to smoking cessation.

item.title: Evercoach | The Abundant Coach
item.description:
Evercoach | The Abundant Coach

"Abundant Coach" is a high-impact training designed to get you maximum results in minimum time. Each video lesson is only 6 minutes or less for fast learning, yet is power punched with transforming ideas that will create powerful shifts even before your coffee break is over.

item.title: Airlines Uses Hypnotherapy for In-Flight Entertainment
item.description:
Airlines Uses Hypnotherapy for In-Flight Entertainment

( Newswire.net -- March 15, 2016) Vermont, South Australia -- The airline British Airways has begun to embrace a new type of in-flight entertainment with their introduction of hypnotherapy courses to their flights in order to help improve health and wellbeing.
